The four bases of psychic power [sn51.20: The basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm and active effort
The basis of psychic power that has immersion due to energy
The basis of psychic power that has immersion due to mental development
The basis of psychic power that has immersion due to inquiry and active effort
How a mendicant meditates perceiving con: Properly grasping the perception of continuity
Attending to the perception of continuity
Bearing the perception of continuity in mind
Comprehending the perception of continuity with wisdom
How a mendicant meditates as below, so a: Examining their own body up from the soles of the feet and down from the tips of the hairs
Recognizing the different parts of the body
Meditating on the body as below, so above; as above, so below
How a mendicant develops a mind that’s f: Properly grasping the perception of light
Properly grasping the perception of day
Developing a mind that’s full of radiance
The benefits of developing the four base: Wielding many kinds of psychic power
Controlling the body as far as the Brahmā realm
Realizing the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
Living having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
